title: Std's . . . Not just long distance phone calls
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales. Dept. of Health, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Sexually transmitted diseases
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Public health - Australia
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sexually transmitted diseases
description: An entertaining look at the ways in which sexually transmitted diseases are transmitted and how they can (mostly) be cured. Looks at what happens at an STD clinic and encourages the use of condoms to prevent STDs.
